comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: That rock is called the Drum and Drumsticks.  It is near Currarong but you can't actually see it "from" there.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] Indeed it is. I guess as the nearest town - Currarong - was used to identify the location of this image.
- AG

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: It is often described as being at the Beecroft Peninsula.
